text: Anata gata shinko suru mono yo, arra to kare no shito o shinji nasai. Mata shito ni kudasa reta Keisuke to, izen ni kudasa reta keiten o shinji nasai. Oyoso arra o shinjinaide, tenshi-tachi to sho Keisuke to kare no shito-tachi, soshite shumatsu no hi o shinjinai mono wa, tashika ni toku mayoi satta monodearu
